channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain, 12th February
item.description:

item.title: Bags still there, after 3rd report..., 12th February
item.description:
2 bags of rubbish/rubble dumped for over 3 months behind wall...still there..3rd time reporting and you always say resolved..

item.title: Drain blocked by uncut foliage is flooding, 12th February
item.description:
Because the street is rarely cleaned the dirt and grass has blocked the drain. Every time there is heavy rain it floods.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Grove, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: Flooded Bridle Path, 12th February

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stable Lane, Bexley, Greater London

item.title: Domestic waste left on the street, 12th February
item.description:
By a tree on Ravenscroft road, near 112 and 114, somebody has left domestic waste (a bin, a blanket, and other miscellaneous items)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenscroft Road, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Inadequate surface repair scheduled., 12th February
item.description:
The crossover from Copers Cope to Alton Gardens has been spray marked for a small area of repair. As the photos show, the whole apron requires resurfacing. It would seem false economy to only do the patch repair already marked up and complete resurfacing of the apron is requested. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alton Gardens, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste around bins and broken down sofa, 12th February
item.description:
Hi this has been here for a week now: broken down sofa, rotten vegetables and more bags and waste added daily. Please can someone help thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carter Street, Walworth, Greater London

item.title: In front of 126 olinda, 12th February
item.description:
This car does not belong to a resident and it is not inn working order. it has been parked outside our house for 2 month now which is making our lives difficult as we have little kids...
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Olinda Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Cardboard dumped outside Touchard House, 12th February
item.description:
It’s bad enough that someone in Touchard House is too lazy to put this into the bins which are literally right there but there’s no reason for the bin men not to take it when they emptied the bins. It’s literally just cardboard (now gross, wet cardboard).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chart Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Wood dumped outside my house, 12th February
item.description:
Today on leaving my house I found leaning on my garden wall some wooden items.Two large boards and a couple of planks .I have no idea where they came from but find it strange as my house is halfway down Guam road
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tuam Road, Plumstead
